body:
The final code in nasm is this

section .text
global _start
cpu 386

_start:

MOV ESI, TABLE_A
MOV EDI, TABLE_B
MOV CX, 3

COPY_LOOP:      
    MOV AL, [ESI]
    MOV [EDI], AL

    INC SI
    INC DI
LOOP COPY_LOOP

MOV AX,1
INT 80h

section .data
TABLE_A DB 10, 5, 1
TABLE_B DB 0, 0, 0
title: How can i copy an array in nasm assembly?
